channel.title: Agility [pi] Assistance!
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I've had a few reports of when people log out of my server they loose agility points towards items they can get and it's annoying. Does anyone know how to fix this? I will post anything that is needed. Rep++ for help :).
Kind regards, Skiller8860

item.title: Agility [pi] Assistance!
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Thanks, when reputation comes back (if it ever does) I will be sure to rep you for this :).

Read full topic

item.title: Agility [pi] Assistance!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

skiller8860:

Thanks for the suggestion mate… would this be contained in agility.java ? Is that where it is supposed to save or is it client.java? Should I just look up a project insanity tutorial on how to add agility and see what i do/do not have?

In PlayerSave.java

else if (token.equals("Agility points")) {
						p.agilitypoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Read full topic
